name: Robot Power [LD39]
description:
ROBOT POWER

Theme: Running Out of Power Compo Entry

Instructions:
  • Steer with Left/Right (default is A/D or Arrow Keys)
  • Use Jump key (default is space) to use booster backpack and fly
  • Collect batteries to power the robot
  • Collect the Star Fragments (one on each level) and return to the rocket
  • Complete all levels
  • Increase difficulty and repeat the above =)

For the theme I decided to make a game where you play the character of a robot running (and flying) between floating islands to gather star fragments that were scattered following a supernova. Each level contains a star fragment that you need to collect before you return to the rocket that takes you to the next level. Once you’ve completed all the levels, increase the level of difficulty and try again. How far can you get?

Game-Play Video Making-Of Time-Lapse & Narrated Post Mortem Video
